official_title: A resolution to authorize James Estep, Senate Computer Center, and Harold W. Needham, Superintendent, Senate Service Department, to appear as witnesses in the case of Common Cause, et al. v. Benjamin Bailar, et al.

summary.text: Authorizes James Estep, Senate Computer Center, and Harold W. Needham, Superintendent, Senate Service Department, to appear as witnesses in the case of Common Cause, et. al. v. Benjamin Bailar, et. al.
